mapper.select: select SERIAL_NUM as serialNum, DEVICE_MAC as deviceMac, PRODUCT_CODE as productCode, PRODUCT_CODE_NAME as productCodeName, REGIST_TIME as registTime, USER_CELLPHONE_NO as phone, USER_ADDRESS as address from V_ODS_DEVICE_CENTER_INFO where 1=1 and PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode} and REGIST_TIME >= #{startTime} order by REGIST_TIME
